title: raamaa nIvE gAni
sahitya:
rAma nIvEgAni nannu rakSincu vArevarE

anupallavi

 sOma sUrya lOcana sundara vadana shrI

caraNam 1

 tAta vacana paripAla puruhUtadyamara pArijAta saumitritO sIta ramaNitO velasina
   
caraNam 2

 dharAdharAbha sharIra bhavaja sukumAra sAkEtapura vihAra nannElukOra
   
caraNam 3

 nAga shayana muni yAga pAlana bhakta bhAgadEya pAvana tyAgarAja sannuta
